message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I think it will be highly valuable to you.  Given its value, I'm asking for $11,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. I'd be willing to go up to $9,500. Can you consider that?
